description:
I did my best to explain, how to solve the Rubik's cube as simple as possible.

My target audience are, who ever is interested in running the brain little more than the rest.

Rubik's cube is the term that could be searched for finding this course.

You need to obtain your own Rubik's cube, which can be found in toy selling companies, internet, etc.

The course is about 32 minutes. However you need to master the skills to be faster.

While teaching on how to solve the Rubik's cube I have segmented it in fours sections. And I have added a fifth bonus section for lubricating the Rubik's cube.

If you like to force the brain little more than the rest and if you like to show off to friends/family members, after completing this course and mastering the required skills you can show of your new skill.

I hope you enjoy it.

Ati
title: Let's learn how to solve a Rubik's cube
